original_title: Ukrainian arrested in Italy over Nord Stream sabotage – German prosecutors — RT World News
article_summary: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz faces opposition from coalition partners over his plan to send troops to Ukraine, with the Social Democratic Party only supporting deployment if the US leads. Trump has ruled out US ground troops in Ukraine, but may offer air support if hostilities end. Merz's plan raises strategic questions and potential legal issues if Ukraine is attacked. Meanwhile, the US plan to build a naval drone fleet to counter China faces technical issues and management turmoil.</s>
